title: From Boardroom to Bedroom
description:
In pursuit of the truth,
she finds desire…
Going undercover lands her under the covers…
with her boss!
When her reality-TV star stepmother threatens her rightful inheritance, designer Sophie Blackwood fights back. To get dirt on the gold digger, she poses as a consultant to media CEO Nigel Townshend. But Sophie can’t resist the dreamy Brit, and professionalism takes a turn toward passion. Suddenly everything is at stake if her secret is exposed—her family legacy and the man she desires…USA TODAY BESTSELLING AUTHOR
author: Jules Bennett
